front.title: Toward the Definition of the SIP Events Package for SPIRITS Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes the definition of the SIP EventPackage for SPIRITS, based on on the structure defined in [1], theSPIRITS protocol requirements documented in [2], the overall SPIRITSArchitecture presented in RFC 3136 [3], the discussion at theSalt Lake City meeting, and the subsequent decisions. To this end,the document defines the package and event names, and addressesthe SUBSCRIBE paramaters.
